meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grand.
meanings.sent1: The grandness of the castle took my breath away.
meanings.sent2: The grandness of the mountain range was truly awe-inspiring.
meanings.sent3: The grandness of the cake made everyone at the party gasp in amazement.
meanings.sent4: The grandness of the waterfall was like nature's own masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The grandness of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant hues.

meanings.definition: The quality of being impressive or imposing in size or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The grandness of the elephant's tusks was remarkable.
meanings.sent2: The grandness of the ancient tree captured everyone's attention.
meanings.sent3: The grandness of the giant pumpkin at the fair was unbelievable.
meanings.sent4: The grandness of the skyscraper towered over the city skyline.
meanings.sent5: The grandness of the ship's sails billowed in the wind.
